title: [Whistler's Pass, Brambles]
description: Brambles mix with green bushes, creating a hidden hazard to the unwary traveller in the night.  Red berries in the bushes tempt birds to swoop in for a quick meal, but the unlucky ones have become impaled on the long thorns.
